metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7540 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.10.x allowing x86 PV guest OS users to cause a denial of service (host OS CPU hang) via non-preemptable L3/L4 pagetable freeing.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7540` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxencall1 - 4.8.3+comet2+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u5
libxendevicemodel1 - 4.8.3+comet2+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u5
